original_text: and from the city he took an officer who had been in command of the men of war, and seven men of the king's council, who were found in the city; and the secretary of the commander of the army, who mustered the people of the land; and sixty men of the people of the land, who were found in the midst of the city.
korean_text: 또 성 안에서 사람을 사로잡았으니 곧 군사를 거느린 지휘관 한 사람과 또 성중에서 만난 왕의 내시 칠 명과 군인을 감독하는 군 지휘관의 서기관 하나와 성 안에서 만난 평민 육십 명이라

sentences.original_text: and from the city he took an officer
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 성에서 한 장교를 데려갔고

sentences.original_text: who had been in command of the men of war
and seven men of the king's council
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕의 의회에 속한 일곱 사람을

sentences.original_text: who were found in the city
and the secretary of the commander of the army
who mustered the people of the land
and sixty men of the people of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 땅의 백성 중 육십 명을

sentences.original_text: who were found in the midst of the city
